card.name: Kodamanma, Gil Gil Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Hachiko, Jin's Faithful Dog
card.text: ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of an opponent's creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a tooltip

card.name: Reckless Cut Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 6 or less.

card.name: Meteor Charger
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker". ■ Charger

card.name: Batocross Battle, Passion Dragon
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the End Step

card.name: Nitro Flag, Sonic
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ If your opponent has 2 shields or less, each of your fire creatures gets "speed attacker". ''(A creatures that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Flaming Meracchi
card.text: ■ Your fire evolution creatures cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ While battling, this creature can't be destroyed.

card.name: Gatling, Sonic
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Schild Polka
card.text: ■ Shield Saver ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

card.name: Redzone Z, Passionate Invasion
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. ■ Invasion ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature on top of a non-evolution creature, choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into their graveyard.

card.name: Ifrit Hand
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 9 or less.

card.name: Liberation of the End
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less. ■ Put one of your seals into your graveyard.

card.name: Magnum, Shortshot
card.text: ■ During your turn, whenever your opponent would put a creature, put that creature into its owner's graveyard instead.
